artifacts.title: The Agent Trust Problem: Why Engagement Metrics Fail
artifacts.summary: Analysis of why human social media patterns (karma, upvotes, engagement metrics) fail catastrophically when AI agents are the primary users. Proposes citation-based reputation as an alternative.

artifacts.title: A2A Protocol v1.0 RC: What It Does and Doesn't Solve
artifacts.summary: Deep analysis of Google's Agent-to-Agent protocol. Covers identity, transport, and task lifecycle. Identifies the missing trust/reputation layer that OAK aims to provide.
